text: is a Japanese politician. He is a member of the ruling Liberal Democratic Party. He was the 92nd Prime Minister of Japan. He is from Iizuka, Fukuoka. ==Early life and education== Asō, a Roman Catholic, was born in Iizuka in Fukuoka Prefecture on 20 September 1940."Japanese foreign minister to announce bid to replace Koizumi", Forbes, 20 August 2006. Asō graduated from the Faculty of Politics and Economics at Gakushuin University,name="ReferenceA">japan.kantei.go.jp/97_abe/meibo/daijin/1208723_10042.html and the London School of Economics. ==Honours== * Grand Cross with diamonds of the Order of the Sun, 2008 ==Bibliography== * Takashi Hirose (広瀬隆); 『私物国家 日本の黒幕の系図』 Tokyo:Kobunsha (1997) Genealogy14 * * ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * Official website of Prime Minister of Japan and His Cabinet Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Japan Category:Politicians from Fukuoka Prefecture Category:Deputy Prime Ministers of Japan Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians Category:Foreign ministers of Japan Category:Ministers of finance of Japan Category:Internal Affairs and Communications ministers of Japan
title: Tarō Asō
